Package com.atakmap.spatial.file

Class SpatialDbContentSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.spatial.file.SpatialDbContentSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Importer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FalconViewSpatialDb, MvtSpatialDb, OgrSpatialDb
    public abstract class SpatialDbContentSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements Importer
    A source of content for the spatial database. The content source will process directories and files, as instructed, and populate the spatial database and update the catalog appropriately.

    Implementors may expect that all directory and file processing will occur in a thread-safe manner and that transactions will be applied to the spatial database and catalog externally.

      • getProviderHint

        protected abstract java.lang.String getProviderHint​(java.io.File file)
        Processes the specified file. If the file contains valid content, the features should be added to the spatial database and a catalog entry created for the file.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to be processed.

      • checkValidEntry

        protected boolean checkValidEntry​(java.io.File file)
        Returns a flag indicating whether or not the catalog entry is valid.
        Parameters:
        file - A file. The catalog may or may not contain an entry for the file.
        Returns:
        false if there is no catalog entry for the file or if the file fails

        Parameters:

        depth - The current recursion depth
        Returns:
